summary: Skyrim Visual Immersion III - the new level of immersion in Skyrim
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]https://lh4.googleusercontent.com/-yzXesGxM7ds/T4farfr84aI/AAAAAAAAB2Q/6KtYrwC_eWw/s920/SVI3_logo.png[/img][/center]
Credits goes to:[list]
[*] Boris Vorontsov, for the ENB Series for Skyrim (nothing would be possible without it),
[*] HeliosDoubleSix, for the great HDR setting and additions to the effects,
[*] TheRadikal, for his Hollywood ENB setting that was a base for the version of SVI setting.
[/list]

[size=4][color=yellow]NOTE:[/color] This is an essential issue for any mod author - check out [url=http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/topic/719025-originalfirst-mod-subsetmodificationinclusion-of-the-original-mods-and-endorsement]here[/url]![/size]

[center][youtube]lvx2Aiq3_as[/youtube][/center]

[img]https://lh5.googleusercontent.com/-_JQl5Y_Z-YE/T1ddVsgp4oI/AAAAAAAAB0k/BashqzdniAM/s181/SVI_Features.png[/img]
Skyrim Visual Immersion levels up the immersion by application of:[list]
[*] depth of field (smooth and bokeh),
[*] anamorphic lens flare (like in some other very cool RPG game ;),
[*] chromatic aberration (applied along with the depth of field or without),
[*] image sharpening,
[*] subtel image grain,
[*] panoramic, widescreen view (ideal for cinamatic experiance),
[*] and more...
[/list]
[size=6][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/readmes/Skyrim%20Visual%20Immersion%20III_readme.txt][color=yellow]See the ReadMe![/color][/url][/size]

Bless You,
MK
author: Matso
